Package com.persistentsystems.socketclient.listeners

Class AbstractWrSocketOnMessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistentsystems.socketclient.listeners.AbstractWrSocketOnMessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WrBlockingSocketListener
    public abstract class AbstractWrSocketOnMessageListener
extends Object
implements com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
    This is an abstract class that is implemented by a child class, mainly WrBlockingSocket, overriding the listeners they need. Note: Documentation here is copied from the Neovisionaries websocket library

        onConnected in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:

      • onConnectError

        public void onConnectError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                           com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xExcept)
                    throws Exception
        Called when WebSocket.connectAsynchronously() failed.

        Note that this method is called only when connectAsynchronously() was used and the connect() executed in the background thread failed. Neither direct synchronous connect() nor connect(ExecutorService) will trigger this callback method.

        Specified by:
        onConnectError in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xExcept - The exception thrown by connect() method.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).

      • onDisconnected

        public void onDisconnected​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                           com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFrame xServerCloseFrame,
                           com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFrame xClientCloseFrame,
                           boolean xByServer)
                    throws Exception
        Called after the WebSocket connection was closed.
        Specified by:
        onDisconnected in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xServerCloseFrame - The close frame which the server sent to this client. This may be null.
        xClientCloseFrame - The close frame which this client sent to the server. This may be null.
        xByServer - true if the closing handshake was started by the server. false if the closing handshake was started by the client.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).

        public void onError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                    com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause)
             throws Exception
        Call when an error occurred. This method is called before an onXxxError method is called.

        xCause - An exception that represents the error.

      • onFrameError

        public void onFrameError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                         com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause,
                         com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFrame xWebSocketFrame)
                  throws Exception
        Called when a WebSocket frame failed to be read from the WebSocket.

        Some WebSocket server implementations close a WebSocket connection without sending a close frame to a client in some cases. Strictly speaking, this behavior is a violation against the specification (RFC 6455). However, this library has allowed the behavior by default since the version 1.29. Even if the end of the input stream of a WebSocket connection were reached without a close frame being received, it would trigger neither onError() method nor onFrameError() method. If you want to make this library report an error in the case, pass false to WebSocket.setMissingCloseFrameAllowed(boolean) method.

        Specified by:
        onFrameError in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xCause - An exception that represents the error. When the error occurred because of InterruptedIOException, exception.getError() returns WebSocketError.INTERRUPTED_IN_READING. For other IO errors, exception.getError() returns WebSocketError.IO_ERROR_IN_READING. Other error codes denote protocol errors, which imply that some bugs may exist in either or both of the client-side and the server-side implementations.
        xWebSocketFrame - The WebSocket frame. If this is not null, it means that verification of the frame failed.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).

      • onMessageError

        public void onMessageError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                           com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause,
                           List<com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFrame> xList)
                    throws Exception
        Called when it failed to concatenate payloads of multiple frames to construct a message. The reason of the failure is probably out-of-memory.
        Specified by:
        onMessageError in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xCause - An exception that represents the error.
        xList - The list of frames that form a message. The first element is either a text frame and a binary frame, and the other frames are continuation frames.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).

      • onMessageDecompressionError

        public void onMessageDecompressionError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                                        com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause,
                                        byte[] xBytes)
                                 throws Exception
        Called when a message failed to be decompressed.
        Specified by:
        onMessageDecompressionError in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xCause - An exception that represents the error.
        xBytes - The compressed message that failed to be decompressed.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).
        Since:
        1.16

      • onTextMessageError

                               com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause,
                               byte[] xBytes)
                        throws Exception
        Called when it failed to convert payload data into a string. The reason of the failure is probably out-of-memory.

      • onSendError

        public void onSendError​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                        com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause,
                        com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFrame xWebSocketFrame)
                 throws Exception
        Called when an error occurred when a frame was tried to be sent to the server.
        Specified by:
        onSendError in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xCause - An exception that represents the error.
        xWebSocketFrame - The frame which was tried to be sent. This is null when the error code of the exception is FLUSH_ERROR.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).

                              com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketException xCause)
                       throws Exception
        Called when an uncaught throwable was detected in either the reading thread (which reads frames from the server) or the writing thread (which sends frames to the server).

        Parameters:

        xCause - The cause of the error.
        Throws:

      • handleCallbackError

                                Throwable xThrowable)
                         throws Exception
        Called when an onXxx() method threw a Throwable.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xThrowable - The Throwable an onXxx method threw.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is just ignored.

      • onSendingHandshake

        public void onSendingHandshake​(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocket xWebSocket,
                               String xRequestLine,
                               List<String[]> xHeaders)
                        throws Exception

        Specified by:
        onSendingHandshake in interface com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketListener
        Parameters:
        xWebSocket - The WebSocket.
        xRequestLine - The request line. For example, "GET /chat HTTP/1.1".
        xHeaders - The HTTP headers.
        Throws:
        Exception - An exception thrown by an implementation of this method. The exception is passed to handleCallbackError(WebSocket, Throwable).
        Since:
        1.21
